GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word in the gaps. Only type one word in each gap.

Content.Question:
1 Do you know if|whether this is the correct platform for trains to Birmingham?
2 Have you ever been to the circus?
3 Will you explain this problem for me? I find it very confusing.
4 Where did you go for your holiday last summer?
5 Is your grandfather still working or retired?
6 Could you tell me the time of the next train to Waterloo station?
7 Who is that woman standing next to the coffee machine?
8 How often do you go to the theatre?
9 Can I ask you whether I've filled this form in correctly?
10 Does everyone in your family have brown eyes and hair?
